Welcome to Davidovici Software

Your partner in web development and consulting.

About Us

Welcome to Davidovici Software, where we provide comprehensive consulting services designed to elevate your business. From web development to e-commerce solutions and API development, we offer a wide range of services to meet the diverse needs of our clients. Our client-centric approach ensures that each solution is tailored to your specific requirements, delivering maximum value and impact. With a team of skilled professionals and a passion for technology, we are dedicated to helping your business succeed. Let us be your partner in navigating the digital landscape and achieving lasting success.

Our Services

Web Development

Building responsive and interactive websites using the latest web technologies.

E-commerce Solutions

Creating online stores with secure payment processing and easy-to-manage product listings.

Web Scraping

Extracting data from websites for various use cases, including market research and competitive analysis.

Data Science and Analytics

Leveraging data to provide insights and drive decision-making through advanced analytics and machine learning.

Performance Optimization

Optimizing the performance of your website to ensure fast load times and a smooth user experience.

Custom Software Development

Developing custom software solutions tailored to your business needs.

UI/UX Design

Designing user-friendly interfaces and experiences that delight users and meet business goals.

Mobile App Development

Creating high-quality mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.

SEO Services

Increasing your website's visibility on search engines, driving more traffic, and boosting sales through comprehensive SEO strategies.

Email Marketing Services

Helping you connect with your audience, build relationships, and drive conversions through effective email marketing campaigns.

Maintenance and Support

Providing ongoing maintenance and support to ensure your applications run smoothly and securely.

DevOps and Infrastructure Management

Implementing and managing CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure, and automation.

Our Projects

Project Zechus Avos

A website for a prominent Hasidic rabbi to list available chapters of books for sponsorships and dedications.

  • Stripe webhooks
  • RESTful Node.js APIs
  • Data validation and formatting

Technologies: Node.js, Stripe, Express.js

Zeev-Jewelry E-commerce Store

A luxury jewelry e-commerce store using MVC architecture with Next.js and Laravel.

  • User authentication
  • Product listing
  • Stripe integration
  • Shopping cart
  • Order management

Technologies: Next.js, Laravel, MySQL

View on GitHubView Live

Kehilas Lev V'Nefesh Website

A website for a synagogue to display prayer times, announcements, and static information.

  • CRUD operations for minyanim times
  • File handling for minyan sheets
  • HTTPS and Stripe for data security

Technologies: Node.js, PostgreSQL, Heroku

View on GitHubView Live

Chess Engine

A chess engine built with C++, Django, React, and PostgreSQL.

  • Can play against other bots online
  • Potential ELO of 3000

Technologies: C++, Django, React, PostgreSQL
